body_html: I think 0.1s difference is not worth introducing this? Say I invoke 100 times cmake everyday this change will only save me 10s, while on the other hand if this causes any confusion people will need to spend much more time than that to debug.
body_text: I think 0.1s difference is not worth introducing this? Say I invoke 100 times cmake everyday this change will only save me 10s, while on the other hand if this causes any confusion people will need to spend much more time than that to debug.
body: I think 0.1s difference is not worth introducing this? Say I invoke 100 times cmake everyday this change will only save me 10s, while on the other hand if this causes any confusion people will need to spend much more time than that to debug.
